title: Cinco anos
creator_credit: Angela Barnett and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
brief_description: Accompanied by a soundtrack of vibrant Spanish music, this animated short contains a montage of multi-layered colourful images using hand-drawn animation, newspaper cuttings and stills to convey a sense of location and environment.
